welcome_benefits: A cashback of Rs. 250 on spending Rs. 2500 within the first 30 days.

Rewards Rate: 0.75% cashback on all retail spends, 5% cashback on movies & groceries.
Insurance Benefits: Credit shield cover in case of death of the primary cardholder

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge is waived off for all transactions between Rs. 400 & Rs. 5,000.
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the withdrawn amount or Rs. 300 (whichever is higher).

product_details: You get a 0.75% cashback on all retail spending.
Get a 5% cashback on all your spending on groceries and movie ticket bookings.
Get a 5% cashback on utility bill payments through YES PayNow.
Get Rs. 250 cashback on spending Rs. 2500 within the first 30 days.Exciting offers on travel, shopping, dining, wellness, etc through Yes Privileges.
